Entries.default: "Did you hear? The Gilded Kestrel was lost at sea."
"From Gold-fin's fleet? Impossible with her wealth."
"The Floating Hangman got them. Now they're bones."
"Don't look now, I think that's the captain who blew old Benny to bits!"
"I heard he was playing the harpsichord when he went."
"The Watcher is a regular shiphunter's shiphunter."
"Aye, anyone who kills that many Vailian Trading bastards is a right hero of mine."
"Oh look, it's the pirate who hunts other pirates."
"Blackheart!"
"I saw it through my spyglass, and I still can't believe Aeldys is gone."
"She had the sea in her heart and salt in her veins."
"The Council hung Furrante! Can you believe it?"
"It's nigh madness, ain't it?"
"Weren't no one to bribe."
"The Drake's in port."
"Brutal Ben's ship? Can't be. I heard he lost it."
"I didn't say he was the one who sailed it in, now did I?"
"Careful of that one. The Watcher's friends with Benweth."
"Don't want to get on either's bad side then, eh?"
"There goes the captain who murdered Benweth."
"Looks cleaner than I expected."
